definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
"dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]
to request/to require/requirement/to stake a claim/to ask/to demand/CL:點|点[dian3]
to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly/to seek after/to woo
to solicit/to seek/to request (opinions, feedback etc)/to petition
to make every effort to/striving to do one's best
to seek truth from facts (idiom)/to be practical and realistic

sentences.english: Deliver me from the workers of iniquity, and save me from bloody men.
sentences.chinese: 求你救我脫離作孽的人，和喜愛流人血的人。

sentences.english: She gave us food and clothes and asked for nothing in return.
sentences.chinese: 她給了我們食物和衣服，沒求任何回報。

sentences.english: The replier said that he went to a Chrisitan high school when he was young.
sentences.chinese: 迴應當中的一位網友說到自己求學時的經歷。

sentences.english: I has changed a lot, so the teacher told me to sit at the second row.
sentences.chinese: 我改好了，所以老師讓我坐在第二排了，求英文。

sentences.english: And Shechem spake unto his father Hamor, saying, Get me this damsel to wife.
sentences.chinese: 4示劍對他父親哈抹說，求你爲我聘這女子爲妻。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the relationship between the truth perfect, beautiful life principle and university education.
sentences.chinese: 論述了求真求善求美的人生理念與大學教育的關係。

sentences.english: Wash me, cleanse me in the blood That flowed from Calvary.
sentences.chinese: 求你所流寶貝血，洗淨我衆罪孽。

sentences.english: Desorption activating energy and pre-exponential factor were calculated.
sentences.chinese: 求出脫附活化能和指前因子。

sentences.english: Its optimal solution is obtained by finding a nonnegative solution of compatible equations.
sentences.chinese: 其最優解是通過求一個相容方程組的非負解而得到。

sentences.english: We will end up with double integral on S of z dxdy.
Tell me how you can be tied.
sentences.chinese: 求你告訴我，當用何法捆綁你。

sentences.english: Longevity and for banquets, constitute the basis for the Chung Yeung Festival.
sentences.chinese: 求長壽及飲宴，構成了重陽節的基礎。

sentences.english: Show me that my tears have made my rainbows.
sentences.chinese: 求你使我看見我的眼淚是築成虹彩的材料。

sentences.english: Father is in a good mood at the moment.Strike while the iron is hot and ask him to let you go to the circus.
sentences.chinese: 這時父親的情緒很好，乘此機會求他讓你去看馬戲。

sentences.english: Do not go through life; Grow through life.
sentences.chinese: 不求匆匆過人生，只求天天都成長。

sentences.english: He went to Pilate, and begged the body of Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 這人去見彼拉多，求耶穌的身體。

definition: to ask for sth and receive it/to try to obtain/to look for and obtain
to ask for help/to ask a favor/to recruit talented people
to seek for/to hope to gain/desirous
to redeem a vow (to a deity)/to fulfill a promise/votive
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
